trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SEQ_00<tab>Amidst the sadness of Alphinaud's countenance, there is a newfound determination.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud and have him accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie while accompanied by Alphinaud and have them accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_TODO_03<tab>Follow the crystalline path while accompanied by Alphinaud and Alisaie, and speak with Alphinaud at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>Fools, all of them... Fools...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>That crystalline path─G'raha has paved it for us.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Difficult as it is, we must carry on. For our friends, and all who await us in faith.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>So come, let us seek the path's beginning. It appears to be near the outpost.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>I won't let it break me, don't you worry. I never have, and I never will.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A portal has opened.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>It will surely deliver us true. It must.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_Q1_000_040<tab>Travel through the portal?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>Look up, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's as though the stars are being devoured by the dead sun...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>And that's where we're headed─into the maw of darkness.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Well, here is where the path begins. And it ascends to dizzying heights...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>Let us make our way, one sure step at a time.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_Q2_000_060<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A2_000_061<tab>Talk.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A2_000_062<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A2_000_063<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Now more than ever, we must walk as one. Will you go and take Alisaie's hand?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_Q3_000_070<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>Forgotten something, have you? Very well, we'll be waiting by the portal.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_075<tab>Aye, let us press on. One sure step at a time, till we win through to Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>We should keep moving. Go and tell Alphinaud, will you?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_091<tab>You should have Alphinaud accompanying you before setting forth.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>Our friends got us this far. Their courage, their strength. Their wisdom. Their love.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>We owe it to them to continue. No matter how long it takes...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A3_000_110<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Gaze at the distant stars.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A3_000_111<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Listen to the silence.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A3_000_112<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Look back on the path.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A3_000_113<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Offer a word of comfort.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_A3_000_114<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Look at the path ahead.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>Should you start to fall, we'll be here to catch you. I know you'll do the same for us.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_121<tab>Alisaie appears to have fallen behind... We had best head back and fetch her.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_125<tab>G'raha paved this path for us. We were meant to follow it.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_126<tab>Where did Alphinaud disappear to now? We need to turn around and look for him.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>We understand, take what time you need. When you're ready to continue, we'll be waiting by the portal.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_135<tab>If you're ready, then so am I. Let's follow the path where it leads!
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_140<tab>The innumerable lights that shine in the distance─to think that they all could have birthed civilizations...

TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_141<tab>To think that everything they built has gone to dust, their peoples lost to despair... Of the stars floating in this sea of midnight, ours is a lonely aberration.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_142<tab>And yet...no matter how many worlds have met their ends, with you and Alisaie beside me, there is nothing I fear. No ocean so vast I cannot cross.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_145<tab>Those broken stars I see─shattered, ruptured, unraveled─I wonder if they're also worlds recreated at their ends...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_146<tab>The sight of them fills me with a sorrow I cannot describe...and a truth I cannot deny.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_147<tab>Birth...and death. Whence we came and where we'll return. A wheel from which there is no escape.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_150<tab>...Thancred would scout the road ahead. Y'shtola and Urianger would trade opinions on esoteric subjects.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_151<tab>G'raha would join in their discussion, or else chat with me and Alisaie about the mission. Estinien would be at the rear, apart yet present.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_152<tab>All the while you would come and go. Wherever you are needed. And together, we would travel...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_155<tab>All I can hear are my footfalls. My heartbeat. It's so much quieter now...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_156<tab>But the fact we can breathe and continue on is proof that the others are still with us.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_157<tab>They are... They are... Aren't they...?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_160<tab>The portal is barely visible from up here.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_161<tab>...Truly, we've come far. Much farther than would have been possible had we kept chasing perfect ideals as we did in the past.

TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_162<tab>It is because we have known failure and frustration─that we have learned and grown from them─that Hydaelyn has entrusted us with this mission. With the fate of the very star.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_165<tab>It's all a dream, isn't it...? A long, elaborate dream...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_166<tab>Any moment now, I'll wake up in my bed. Still a student. Grandfather alive. I'd go about my day, relieved as the fragments of that other life fade away...

TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_167<tab>And that would be happiness...wouldn't it? That none of it... No. No, I won't give up these experiences. Good and bad, they are mine. They are <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_170<tab>Rest assured I am fine...but thank you for your concern. What of yourself? Though we can't afford to be too leisurely, neither need we rush unduly.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_171<tab>We've crossed an impossible distance to stand where we are now, and we're but a few steps away from journey's end. It will be over before we know it.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_175<tab>Me...? Oh, I still have plenty of legs left in me, don't you worry. It's you I'm worried about.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_176<tab>You always push yourself so hard for us─for everyone. And while we're here, we'll make sure to bear our share of the burden.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_180<tab>Well, this is it. The end of the path, and the beginning of whatever awaits.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_181<tab>There will be greater hardships. We may be made to feel powerless.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_182<tab>Yet come what may, let us have no regrets. No, let us have pride in what we have achieved.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_183<tab>In what we achieved, and how it changed us for the better... That's worth fighting for. And dying for. As they did...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_185<tab>There are some structures up ahead. Still a ways to go before we reach the dead sun...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_186<tab>Given...all this...I know how naive it must sound to hope it all works out somehow.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_187<tab>Still, you'll forgive me if I wish for it all the same. And for you most of all.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_188<tab>Not that you of all people need it. It's just...after all the help you've given me, for once I want to be the one to help you.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_190<tab>Of all the recreated worlds we've seen, this one feels the most familiar...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_SYSTEM_000_195<tab>You should have Alisaie accompanying you before continuing.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_200<tab>This is almost...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_201<tab>Normal? It's not unlike many cities we know. But it's deathly quiet...
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_202<tab>Mayhap the inhabitants are within the buildings. Or invisible to our senses.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_METEION_000_203<tab>(-???-)Wrong on both counts. There is simply no one here.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_204<tab>Meteion!
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_METEION_000_205<tab>This is how I found it when I arrived. Another star which once pulsed with life, but no longer.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_METEION_000_206<tab>How it ended, I do not know. Invasion, sickness, suicide─none can say.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_METEION_000_207<tab>None lived to speak for the dead. They are gone. Gone. Search all you like, but you'll only end up turning back.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALISAIE_000_210<tab>If what Meteion says is true, what are we supposed to do...?
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_220<tab>If there is no one here, then neither should there be emotion to bar our way.
TEXT_AKTKMG113_04462_ALPHINAUD_000_221<tab>Yet Meteion seems convinced we'll turn back. What riddle is this...?
